Each Track contains bite-sized blocks of content that are designed to support your understanding of the material.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TRACK 1: MICROSERVICES IN THE DIGITAL-FIRST ERA + KNOWLEGE CHECK QUESTION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TRACK 2: WHAT IS CONTENTFUL?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TRACK 3: WHY CONTENTFUL?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TRACK 4: CONTENTFUL IN ACTION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TRACK 5: COURSE FEEDBACK\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To access course materials press ‘Get Started’ Button. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://training.contentful.com/student/path/846843/activity/1054651\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Link to the module\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}}"
